== About me ==

I joined Ubuntu on December 2005 with '''Ubuntu 5.10''' after using for a year '''Debian&Fluxbox''', study GNU/Linux on <nowiki>[[http://a2.pluto.it|Appunti di informatica Libera]]</nowiki> and many more manual.

I joined on LP in December 2005 and I started to contribute to early 2006 in <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-it.org/GruppoDocumentazione|Documentation Italian Team]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-it.org/GruppoPromozione | Marketing Italian Team]]</nowiki>.
